blocks.name: df-sdrg
blocks.content: A sub-division-ring is a subset of a division ring's set which is a division ring under the induced operation. If the overring is commutative this is a field; no special consideration is made of the fields in the center of a skew field. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: issdrg
blocks.content: Property of a division subring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm issdrg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr)))
} = {
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr)), wa(wcel(c1, cdr), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr))))
  biadanii(wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)), wcel(c1, cdr), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr)))
  sseldi(c1, cdr, cdm(csdrg), wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)))
  dmmptss(hs0, csdrg, cdr, crab(hs1, cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), cdr)))
  elfvdm(c0, csdrg, c1)
  syl6bb(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr)), wcel(c0, crab(hs1, cfv(csubrg, c1), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), cdr))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1), crab(hs1, cfv(csubrg, c1), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), cdr)), wcel(c1, cdr))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cdr, csdrg, crab(hs1, cfv(csubrg, c1), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), cdr)), crab(hs1, cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), cdr)))
  rabeqbidv(hs1, cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)), cfv(csubrg, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), cdr))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, csubrg)
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), cdr, co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cress, cv(hs1))
  df-sdrg(hs0, hs1)
  rabex(hs1, cfv(csubrg, c1), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), cdr))
  fvex(csubrg, c1)
  elrab(hs1, c0, cfv(csubrg, c1), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), cdr), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr))
  eleq1d(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), cdr, co(c1, cress, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c0, c1, cress)
  3anass(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr))
  diff.hs0.c(cdr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(hs1, cfv(csubrg, c1), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), cdr)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(csubrg, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(csubrg, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issdrg(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(SubDRing ` c1)↔(c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing))
} = {
  bitr4i(c0 ∈(SubDRing ` c1), (c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing), (c1 ∈ DivRing ∧(c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing)))
  biadanii(c0 ∈(SubDRing ` c1), c1 ∈ DivRing, (c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing))
  sseldi(c1, cdr, dom(SubDRing), c0 ∈(SubDRing ` c1))
  dmmptss(hs0, csdrg, cdr, { hs1 ∈(SubRing ` hs0)|(hs0[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing })
  elfvdm(c0, csdrg, c1)
  syl6bb(c1 ∈ DivRing, c0 ∈(SubDRing ` c1), (c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing), c0 ∈ { hs1 ∈(SubRing ` c1)|(c1[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing })
  eleq2d(c0, (SubDRing ` c1), { hs1 ∈(SubRing ` c1)|(c1[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing }, c1 ∈ DivRing)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, cdr, csdrg, { hs1 ∈(SubRing ` c1)|(c1[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing }, { hs1 ∈(SubRing ` hs0)|(hs0[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing })
  rabeqbidv(hs1, (SubRing ` hs0), (SubRing ` c1), hs0 = c1, (hs0[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing, (c1[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, csubrg)
  eleq1d((hs0[|`s]hs1), cdr, (c1[|`s]hs1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, cress, hs1)
  df-sdrg(hs0, hs1)
  rabex(hs1, (SubRing ` c1), (c1[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing)
  fvex(csubrg, c1)
  elrab(hs1, c0, (SubRing ` c1), (c1[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing, (c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing)
  eleq1d((c1[|`s]hs1), cdr, (c1[|`s]c0), hs1 = c0)
  oveq2(hs1, c0, c1, cress)
  3anass(c1 ∈ DivRing, c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1), (c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing)
  diff.hs0.c(cdr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ hs1 ∈(SubRing ` c1)|(c1[|`s]hs1)∈ DivRing })
  diff.hs1.c((SubRing ` hs0))
  diff.hs1.c((SubRing ` c1))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w((c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing)
}

blocks.name: issdrg2
blocks.content: Property of a division subring (closure version). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm issdrg2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cinvr, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr)))
  issdrg(c0, c1)
  3bitr4i(w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr)), w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1))), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1))), wral(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))))
  pm5.32i(wa(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1))), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr), wral(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)))
  issubdrg(s0, c1, c0, co(c1, cress, c0), c2, c3)
  eqid(co(c1, cress, c0))
  df-3an(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cdr))
  df-3an(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cress, c0)
  diff.cress.s(s0)
}

thm issdrg2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(SubDRing ` c1)↔(c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c2 }),(c3 ` s0)∈ c0)))
  ⊣ c3 =(invr ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(0 ` c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈(SubDRing ` c1), (c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c2 }),(c3 ` s0)∈ c0)), (c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing))
  issdrg(c0, c1)
  3bitr4i((c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing), (c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c2 }),(c3 ` s0)∈ c0)), ((c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1))∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing), ((c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1))∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c2 }),(c3 ` s0)∈ c0)))
  pm5.32i((c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)), (c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing, ∀(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c2 }),(c3 ` s0)∈ c0))
  issubdrg(s0, c1, c0, (c1[|`s]c0), c2, c3)
  eqid((c1[|`s]c0))
  df-3an(c1 ∈ DivRing, c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1), (c1[|`s]c0)∈ DivRing)
  df-3an(c1 ∈ DivRing, c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1), ∀(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c2 }),(c3 ` s0)∈ c0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cress, c0)
  diff.cress.s(s0)
}

  eqeltrrd(crab(s1, cpw(c0), wral(s0, cin(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c3, cv(s1)))), cfv(cacs, c0), cin(cpw(c0), ciin(s0, cin(c0, c2), crab(s1, cpw(c0), wi(wss(csn(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0))))

  rabbidva(s1, cpw(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0))), wral(s0, cin(c0, c2), wi(wss(csn(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)))), wral(s0, cin(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c3, cv(s1))))

  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c0)), wss(cin(cv(s1), c2), cin(c0, c2)))

  elpwi(cv(s1), c0)
  ralss(s0, cin(cv(s1), c2), cin(c0, c2), wcel(c3, cv(s1)))

  imbi1d(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c2)), wss(csn(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cv(s1), c2)))
  3bitr4g(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c2)), wss(csn(cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  biantrud(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))

blocks.name: subrgacs
blocks.content: Closure property of subrings. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm subrgacs(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(csubrg, c0), cfv(cacs, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(csubrg, c0), cfv(cacs, c1), cin(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c0))), wcel(c0, crg))
  eqrdv(hs0, cfv(csubrg, c0), cin(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c0))), wcel(c0, crg))
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c0)))))
  issubrg3(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cmgp, c0))
  elin(cv(hs0), cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cin(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c0))), cfv(cacs, c1)), wcel(cfv(cacs, c1), cfv(cmre, cpw(c1))), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cacs, c1)), wcel(cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cacs, c1)))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cacs, c1), cfv(cmre, cpw(c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  mreacs(c1, universe)
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cacs, c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp))
